document_data.mainbody:
taernel Thonok was a well-known founder of the wealthy Thonok family of Amn, who lived many years before the late 14 century DR.
Staernel came to prominence for his impressive business acumen, mercantile intelligence, and infamous dabbling in the art of necromancy. During the familys rise to power, Staernel Thonok was the builder of the familys fine estate, Staerngates, in Purskul. The family founders life was believed to had been ended by some unknown necromantic magics, while some claimed that the research granted Staernel undeath. Purskuls rumor mill claimed that, as of the late 14 century DR, Staernel Thonok was still haunting subterranean granary passages under the town in the form of a terrifying undead "thing." Even though many thought it to be just a tale, the creatures existence was confirmed to be true by Elminster.
